nodes.text: The Chandrila Imperial garrison, also known as the Hanna City Imperial Garrison, was an Imperial garrison located near Hanna City. It was commanded by Major General Kalnor.

During the Galactic Civil War, the garrison was surrounded by an electric fence and a group of AT-ATs. It was also used by Governor Gerald Weizel as his base. After the end of the war, the building was abandoned but not destroyed.
